name: Global Research Conference on Traditional and Alternative Medicine
content: The “Global Research Conference on Traditional and Alternative Medicine”, being organized by Foster Research, will take place in Rome, Italy, December 12–14, 2024\. "Exploring Recent Advancements and Innovations in Traditional and Alternative Medicine" was the congress's main focus. Additionally, you can discuss the most recent findings in traditional and alternative medicine related to environmental health and medicine. Offering the ideal platform for plenary sessions, keynote addresses, invited lectures, and poster presentations, you can update your knowledge on the most recent advancements in research while receiving recognition during this three-day event. Ancient medical knowledge is a topic covered by both traditional and alternative medicine. Primitive medicine employs skills and practices derived from theories, beliefs, and cultural experiences to maintain and improve health as well as diagnose, treat, and prevent mental and physical illnesses. Another name for it is supplementary or alternative medicine. A more widely used kind of traditional medicine is herbal therapy. Ayurveda, homeopathy, aromatherapy, acupuncture, and Chinese or Oriental medicine are examples of traditional alternative medicine. All professionals in Traditional and Alternative medicine, including Ayurvedic practitioners, homeopaths, acupuncturists, phytomedicine, pharmacognosy, naturopathy, botanists, specialists in choice and correlative remedies, and individuals who trust trademark answers for investigating their examination, logical examinations, and experts of a typical drug, are invited to our conference hosted by Foster Research. The main goal of the Traditional and Alternative Medicine Conference is to strengthen the supporting Medicine Practices investigation stages in order to address the challenges of creating a more safe, reasonable, and balanced framework for prescription and well-being.
